SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Exacerbations of Chronic Pulmonary Disease Tool Patient-Reported Outcome - Did your chest feel congested today?
Exacerbations of Chronic Pulmonary Disease Tool Patient-Reported Outcome - How often did you cough today?
Exacerbations of Chronic Pulmonary Disease Tool Patient-Reported Outcome - How much mucus (phlegm) did you bring up when coughing today?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: EXACT - Bring Up Mucus When Coughing

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Exacerbations of Chronic Pulmonary Disease Tool Patient-Reported Outcome - How difficult was it to bring up mucus (phlegm) today?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: EXACT - Difficult to Bring Up Mucus

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Exacerbations of Chronic Pulmonary Disease Tool Patient-Reported Outcome - Did you have chest discomfort today?
Exacerbations of Chronic Pulmonary Disease Tool Patient-Reported Outcome - Did your chest feel tight today?
Exacerbations of Chronic Pulmonary Disease Tool Patient-Reported Outcome - Were you breathless today?
Exacerbations of Chronic Pulmonary Disease Tool Patient-Reported Outcome - Describe how breathless you were today.
Exacerbations of Chronic Pulmonary Disease Tool Patient-Reported Outcome - Were you short of breath today when performing your usual personal care activities like washing or dressing?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: EXACT - Short of Breath When Performing Usual Personal Care

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Exacerbations of Chronic Pulmonary Disease Tool Patient-Reported Outcome - Were you short of breath today when performing your usual indoor activities like cleaning or household work?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: EXACT - Short of Breath When Performing Usual Indoor Activities

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Exacerbations of Chronic Pulmonary Disease Tool Patient-Reported Outcome - Were you short of breath today when performing your usual activities outside the home such as yard work or errands?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: EXACT - Short of Breath When Performing Usual Activities Outside

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Exacerbations of Chronic Pulmonary Disease Tool Patient-Reported Outcome - Were you tired or weak today?
Exacerbations of Chronic Pulmonary Disease Tool Patient-Reported Outcome - Last night, was your sleep disturbed?
Exacerbations of Chronic Pulmonary Disease Tool Patient-Reported Outcome - How scared or worried were you about your lung problems today?
